  • Mar 25, 2018

    Graphic Novel Project

    At the University of Toronto, I took an English course focused on graphic novels. My final project was to create a comic book that was, itself, a visual essay studying another comic book, and I chose to write on one of the books we had studied, Alan Moore’s Batman: The Killing Joke. The result is… not great. But it was a lot of fun, and you can find it here.

    (read more)
